## Testing Checklist

- [ ] All components have been tested locally
- [ ] `/plugin-builder:validate` passes
- [ ] Installation with `/plugin install ./plugins/{username}/{plugin-name}` works
- [ ] All commands execute correctly
- [ ] All agents work as documented
- [ ] All hooks trigger appropriately
- [ ] README includes comprehensive documentation
- [ ] LICENSE file is included
- [ ] plugin.json is valid
- [ ] marketplace.json has been updated

## Documentation

- [ ] README.md includes installation instructions
- [ ] README.md includes usage examples for all components
- [ ] README.md lists any requirements or dependencies
- [ ] Component files have clear, comprehensive prompts
- [ ] Edge cases are documented and handled

## Code Quality

- [ ] No security vulnerabilities
- [ ] No malicious code
- [ ] Follows kebab-case naming conventions
- [ ] JSON files are valid
- [ ] Markdown files are properly formatted
- [ ] Components use appropriate tools (Read, Edit, Grep, Bash, etc.)
